description: Enterprise techniques used by HIDEDRV, ATT&CK software S0135 v1.1
name: HIDEDRV (S0135)

techniques.comment: [HIDEDRV](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0135) injects a DLL for [Downdelph](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0134) into the explorer.exe process.(Citation: ESET Sednit Part 3)
[HIDEDRV](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0135) is a rootkit that hides certain operating system artifacts.(Citation: ESET Sednit Part 3)
